title: Calories in 711 Taquitos
meta_description: Discover calories in 711 taquitos from a standard 7-Eleven style, plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for better meal planning.
assumptions: Standard 7-Eleven style mini beef taquitos, fried in corn tortilla with beef filling, cheese, and mild spices; approximately 50 g each.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact recipe, size, frying method, and fillings. Check product labels for precise values when available.

quick_answer.text: 711 standard taquitos provide about 142,200 kcal and over 4,266 g of fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

tweaks.label: Chicken filling instead of beef (lower fat)

faqs.q: How many calories in one 711 taquito?
faqs.a: About 200 kcal per standard beef taquito.

faqs.q: What are the macros for 711 taquitos?
faqs.a: Approximately 14,220 g carbs, 4,266 g protein, 7,110 g fat.

faqs.q: Do taquitos have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 711 taquitos have around 213,300 mg sodiumâ€”very high.

faqs.q: How does baking affect calories in taquitos?
faqs.a: Baking reduces calories by about 50 kcal per taquito compared to frying.

faqs.q: Are 711 taquitos from 7-Eleven the same as homemade?
faqs.a: Store versions are often higher in sodium and fat due to processing and frying.
